import sys
test=int(input())
while(test>0):
	N=int(input())
	xyz=sys.stdin.readline().split()
	i=99999
	flag='true'
	while(flag=='true'):
		mid_3=int(i%100)/10
		#print '1',mid_3
		if(mid_3==int(xyz[2])):
			mid_3=int((i%1000)/100)
			#print '2', mid_3
			if(mid_3==int(xyz[1])):
				mid_3=int((i%10000)/1000)
				#print '3',mid_3
				if(mid_3==int(xyz[0])):
					if(i%N==0):
						break
		if(i<10000):
			flag='false';
		i-=1
	if(flag=='false'):
		print '0'
	else:
		print int(i/10000), i%10, i/N
	test-=1;
